body_html: As @soumith said above, neither magma nor cublas supports batched gesvd or syevd at the moment. When they add support for these methods, we'd be happy to add them. That said, I always want to add existing batched blas methods in cublas (e.g. getri), but unfortunately there are more important bug fixes for us currently.
body_text: As @soumith said above, neither magma nor cublas supports batched gesvd or syevd at the moment. When they add support for these methods, we'd be happy to add them. That said, I always want to add existing batched blas methods in cublas (e.g. getri), but unfortunately there are more important bug fixes for us currently.
body: As @soumith said above, neither magma nor cublas supports batched gesvd or syevd at the moment. When they add support for these methods, we'd be happy to add them. That said, I always want to add existing batched blas methods in cublas (e.g. getri), but unfortunately there are more important bug fixes for us currently.
